content: to penetrate one size the piece without the weight of the iron pressing down on it after steaming let your headband rest and dry for finished measurements at least 30 minutes 4 5 h x 17 5 circumference/12 cm h x 42 5 cm circumfer- ence wet blocking soak your headband in lukewarm water with your tools favorite wool wash or essential oil for 10-15 minutes 1 stitch marker gently squeeze or press to let out excess water do not tapestry needle wring place headband flat on a towel and roll up to help remove any additional water shape headband and lay flat to dry 3 www shopfactorygirl com hidden falls headband instructions cast-on colorwork tips with your mc and smaller needles co 112 sts using a twisted german cast-on place your bor marker hold your colors consistently to create a and join in the round careful not to twist your sts dominant and background color if you knit by holding one color in each border hand your dominant color should always be held in your left hand your floats will round 1 *k1 p1 repeat from * to end be ever so slightly longer for this color repeat round 1 four times more resulting in slightly larger stitches creating the effect of dominance change to larger needles knit 1 round if you knit using only one hand to drop and pick up a color you will want to be sure when you pick up your dominant body color you carry the float underneath the choose from the 5-color chart or 3-color background color when you drop the chart dominant color and pick up the background color bring the background color on top of knit chart rnds 1 to 24 the dominant color next with mc knit 1 round border change to smaller needles round 1 *k1 p1 repeat from * to end repeat round 1 four times more finishing bind off loosely in pattern weave in all ends 4 hidden
